webDev.title: Web Developer
webDev.description: I am a $$AGE$$ year old student with a great interest in computer science and driven to further build my skills and knowledge in the world of software development. I am convinced that I can make a valuable contribution to any team or project through my passion for programming and willingness to learn and grow.

pianist.title: Pianist
pianist.description: Music is a significant hobby for me. Both listening and playing have always meant a lot to me. I've been playing the piano for as long as I can remember, but it became more serious after attending music school and learning both the accordion and bass guitar. I'm definitely not a professional, but I enjoy playing for myself and others.

webDev.title: My projects
webDev.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Click on a project to learn more about it.

pianist.title: My personal playlist
pianist.description: Here are some of my favorite songs I learned to play. Click on a song to listen to it.

musicschool.title: Followed music school at academy SAMWD
musicschool.description: I followed music school (primary & secondary) at SAMWD from 2011 to 2017. I started with 6 years of accordeon, but later outside of school I also learned to play the piano and bass guitar.

ksa.title: Leader at KSA Oosterzele
ksa.description: I have been a co-leader at KSA Oosterzele (our local youth movement) since 2019. In 2020, I completed an animator course with recognition from KSA Expies.

exchange.title: Uitwisseling naar BraziliÃ«
exchange.description: In the 6th grade of high school, from August 2019 to November 2019, I went on an exchange to Brazil with the exchange organization AFS.

highschool.title: Graduated at high school Don Bosco Zwijnaarde
highschool.description: I completed my secondary education at Don Bosco Zwijnaarde in 2020, where I studied Latin-Sciences.
